inclusion.criterion: Women in the first trimester of pregnancy who sought medical attention at the HMPMP
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: between 16 and 46 years of age with a singleton gestation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A previously known chronic metabolic disease (diabetes, pregestational dyslipidemia,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inflammatory bowel disease and chronic inflammatory conditions, or corticosteroid use
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Hashimoto disease but it is not a chronic metabolic disease. She does not have any other exclusion criteria mentioned.
